code: import React from'react';import{UploadedFile,Button}from'../exports';import{deleteIcon}from'../../assets/exports';import'./modpack.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Modpack=_ref=>{let{modpack,deletePack,toggleShowCreateModpack}=_ref;const expressServerAdd=process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_UPLOADS;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modpack",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modpack-thumbnail",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:expressServerAdd+modpack.thumbnail,alt:"Modpack Thumbnail",width:350,height:200})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modpack-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modpack-content-name-version",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"modpack-content-name",children:modpack.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"modpack-content-version",children:modpack.version})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modpack-content-description",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"modpack-content-description-text",children:modpack.description})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modpack-content-zip",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UploadedFile,{noEdit:true,uploadedModpack:modpack})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modpack-content-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{width:70,height:16,fontSize:"11px",type:"confirm",text:"Edit Pack",onClick:()=>toggleShowCreateModpack(modpack)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"modpack-content-buttons-delete",src:deleteIcon,alt:"Delete Button",width:20,height:20,onClick:()=>deletePack(modpack)})]})]})]});};export default Modpack;
